span.span: The design-time object representing the control associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用於設計工具所擷取的設計階段物件，表示相關聯的控制項設計介面上的物件。The property is used by the designer to retrieve the design-time object representing the control that is associated with the object on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Expressions As ExpressionBindingCollection

summary.span: 在設計階段取得目前控制項的運算式繫結。

span.span: Gets the expression bindings for the current control at design time.

value.span: ，包含針對目前控制項中的屬性所設定的運算式字串。

span.span: An that contains the expressions strings set for properties in the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計裝載，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用方法來取得方法來取得在設計階段設定控制項屬性的運算式。The design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the class to get the class to get the to set expressions for control properties at design time. 運算式字串參考可當地語系化的資源、 應用程式設定、 連接字串或自訂運算式型別。Expression strings reference a localizable resource, an application setting, a connection string, or a custom expression type. 集合包含具有相關聯的運算式字串每個控制項屬性的項目。The collection contains an element for each control property that has an associated expression string. 每個每個元素的屬性會指出相關聯的運算式產生器實作。Each property for each element indicates the associated expression builder implementation. 運算式字串的剖析，而且由相關聯的評估來判斷在執行階段的控制項屬性值。The expression string is parsed and evaluated by its associated to determine the control property value at run time.

During initialization, use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBehaviorAttached() cil managed
abstract member OnBehaviorAttached : unit -> unit override this.OnBehaviorAttached : unit -> unit

summary.span: 當行為與項目關聯時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a behavior is associated with the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已過時。The method is obsolete. 使用和方法為樣式對應屬性的屬性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用方法類別，以在設計階段設定控制項的樣式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 覆寫來操作控制項的初始的樣式，在設計階段方法。Override the method to manipulate the initial styles for the control at design time.

span.para: 方法可以覆寫並實作來執行額外的處理時的行為已附加至設計工具。
The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is attached to the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBehaviorDetaching() cil managed
abstract member OnBehaviorDetaching : unit -> unit override this.OnBehaviorDetaching : unit -> unit

summary.span: 當行為解除與項目的關聯時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a behavior disassociates from the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 方法已過時。The method is obsolete. 使用和方法為樣式對應屬性的屬性。Use the and methods on the property to map properties to styles. 使用方法類別，以在設計階段設定控制項的樣式。Use the method on the class to set styles for the control at design time. 覆寫控制項設計工具來執行動作才能釋放設計工具物件的方法。Override the method for the control designer to perform actions before the designer object is released.

span.para: M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching 方法可以覆寫並實作來執行額外的處理從設計工具卸離時的行為。
The M:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner.OnBehaviorDetaching method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when a behavior is detached from the designer.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The recommended alternative is to handle the Changed event on the DataBindings collection. The DataBindings collection allows more control of the databindings associated with the control. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

span.span: The name of the property that has changed.

summary.span: 提供可以用來指示資料繫結已變更的方法。

span.span: Provides a method that can be used to indicate when a data binding has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具所進行的變更至控制項的資料繫結之後，應該由控制項設計工具呼叫方法。The method should be called by a control designer after the control designer has made a change to the data bindings for the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法已過時。The method is obsolete. 使用事件對等控制項設計工具功能的集合。Use the event on the collection for equivalent control designer functionality.

span.para: 方法可以覆寫並實作來執行額外的處理控制項的資料繫結集合變更時。
The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the data bindings collection for the control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSetParent() cil managed
abstract member OnSetParent : unit -> unit override this.OnSetParent : unit -> unit

summary.span: 提供當關聯的控制項附加至父控制項時，執行其他處理的方法。

span.span: Provides a way to perform additional processing when the associated control is attached to a parent control.

span.para: 方法可以覆寫並實作以在設計工具會附加至父控制項時執行其他處理。
The method can be overridden and implemented to perform additional processing when the designer is attached to a parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterEvents(class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterEvents (events As IDictionary)

param.name: events
param.span: ，包含要公開元件的事件名稱。

span.span: An that contains the names of the events of the component to expose.

summary.span: 設定在設計階段公開 (Expose) 的針對元件之 物件的事件清單。

span.span: Sets the list of events that are exposed at design-time for the object for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來將項目加入或移除的設計工具會透過公開的事件字典中的項目物件。The method provides a way to add items to or remove items from the dictionary of events that a designer exposes through a object. 中的事件字典的索引鍵是事件的名稱。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 物件是類型。The objects are of type .

span.para: 您可以直接修改字典可透過存取或者您可以將保留不變的字典。如果您覆寫方法，呼叫基底實作，才能執行您自己的篩選。

You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through or you can leave the dictionary unchanged. If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.

You can directly modify the dictionary that is accessible through or you can leave the dictionary unchanged. If you are overriding the method, call the base implementation before you perform your own filtering.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該於序列化 (Serialization) 期間，在程式碼後置 (Code-Behind) 檔案中為目前設計文件建立控制項的欄位宣告。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to create a field declaration for the control in the code-behind file for the current design document during serialization.

value.span: 如果應該建立宣告，則為 ，否則為 。
